name: search_skills
description: Search for agent skills using ES|QL full-text search. Returns matching skills with relevance scores.

query.description: Search query string to find relevant skills

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

name: get_skill_by_id
description: Retrieve a specific skill by its unique identifier.

skill_id.description: The unique identifier of the skill to retrieve

name: list_skills_by_domain
description: List all skills within a specific domain category (e.g., finance, insurance, life_sciences).

domain.description: The domain category to filter skills by

name: get_skill_metadata
description: Retrieve metadata for a skill including tags, complexity, and last updated timestamp.

skill_id.description: The unique identifier of the skill

name: search_skills_by_tags
description: Search for skills matching specific tags.

tags.description: Array of tags to search for

match_all.description: If true, requires all tags to match; if false, matches any tag

name: execute_skill
description: Execute a skill with provided parameters and return the result.

skill_id.description: The unique identifier of the skill to execute

parameters.description: Parameters to pass to the skill execution
